title: (x) Les Cœurs Qui Fondent script - Las Vegas {Paul H}
content:
anybody know the name of this snazzy font? thanks in advance!!!!!

| --- | --- |

author: SKUMATIK

comments.content:
I think this is one of those old Letraset faces that I always kick myself for not knowing off the top of my head.

- Lex

P.S. Read the [FAQ](http://web.archive.org/web/20070714142758/http:/typophile.com/forum/typeid/faq) to make your thread title more “HEEEEEEEEEEELLLLLPPPPPPPPFUL”.

[Las Vegas](http://web.archive.org/web/20070714142758/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=vegas&x=0&y=0)

a modified version of the Letraset font, Vegas.
